jobDescription: Speech TherapistTotal Education Solutions (TES) is a leading national provider of outsourced special education and therapeutic services to public, private, and charter schools as well as healthcare organizations throughout California, Michigan, and Ohio. Our professional, multi-disciplinary staff delivers therapeutic services in our family-centered clinics, in schools, at home, and on-line. We also provide a variety of support and management services to the non-profit Institute for the Redesign of Learning.  Seeking a Speech Pathologist to provide services at one of our client school locations in Detroit Michigan.  We're offering a $1000.00 sign-on bonus for this position. A license and Masters degree in Speech and Language Pathology is required.
